text: John Thomas Richardson (December 20, 1923 - March 29, 2022) was an American academic and priest. He was the 9th President of DePaul University from 1981 through 1993. He began his academic career with DePaul University in 1954. He became a priest in 1949. He was born in Dallas, Texas. Richardson died on March 29, 2022 in Perryville, Missouri at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American Roman Catholic priests Category:Academics from Chicago Category:Academics from Texas Category:People from Dallas
title: John T. Richardson
